summary: Diff adds an IC asset canister headers config file and updates two project/meta summary files, but does not provide verifiable deployment documentation, SPA deep-link fallback behavior, or backend deployment readiness changes required by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add production deployment documentation explaining how to deploy to IC mainnet (prereqs, build steps, `dfx deploy --network ic`, and how to get live URL(s)).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any new or modified deployment guide (e.g., DEPLOYMENT.md/README). The only added functional file is an assets headers config; the mention of DEPLOYMENT.md appears only inside a summary/metadata file, not as an actual file change.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions DEPLOYMENT.md but no DEPLOYMENT.md file is added/modified in diff list)
<file-diff> Added files list only includes frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure clean production build path and SPA routing compatibility on IC assets canister (deep links/refresh do not 404).
missing_requirements.reason: While an IC assets config file was added, its shown content only sets cache/content-type headers and does not demonstrate SPA deep-link fallback (e.g., serving index.html for unknown routes). There are also no build-related config changes shown (vite/webpack/router/base path) to support production builds on IC.
evidence: frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5 (content shows only headers rules; no explicit SPA fallback behavior shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirm backend canister deployment readiness (Motoko compiles and deploys to mainnet without candid/config errors).
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files (e.g., backend/main.mo, dfx.json, canister interface config) are added or modified in the diff, so there is no evidence of ensuring backend build/deploy readiness.
evidence: <file-diff> Modified files list contains no backend/* files
<file-diff> Added files list contains no backend/* files

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking updates (project_state.json) unrelated to production deployment requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding or updating internal tracking metadata files; only deployment documentation and build/deploy readiness changes were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend change summaries added/updated in frontend-file-summaries.txt.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding or updating a frontend file summary document; it is not part of the specified deployment documentation (REQ-1) and does not itself implement deployment/build changes.
